thread.title: Police: Man shot to death in Boston - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Police: Man shot to death in Boston - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Police: Man shot to death in Boston - Massachusetts news
text:
BOSTON (AP) — Police are investigating a late night shooting in Boston that left one man dead.
The victim was found outside an apartment complex in the city’s Brighton neighborhood shortly before midnight Thursday.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below He had been shot in the chest and torso and was pronounced dead at the scene.
Police have not released his name but say he was 30 years old.
Witnesses say the shooter fled from the scene on foot.
Investigators are looking at surveillance cameras and canvassing the area.
There was no immediate word on arrests.
The shooting was the city’s 29th homicide of 2015.
